severance.averageWageDesc: Average Wage: Total wages for the 3 months before retirement date divided by the total number of days in that period
severance.monthlySalaryDesc: Monthly Salary: Recent monthly salary (used as an approximation for average wage calculation)
severance.yearsHint: Decimal input possible (e.g., 3.5 years or 3 years 6 months)

result.title: Calculation Result
result.formulaText: Average Wage × 30 days × Years of Service
result.noteText: Calculation is based on Article 34 of the Labor Standards Act.
result.noteText2: Actual severance pay may vary depending on how average wage is calculated, whether various allowances are included, etc.
